name: Snowflake
overview: Analyze your Snowflake experimentation data with LaunchDarkly.
description: Enable LaunchDarkly's experimentation platform to read and analyze data from your Snowflake data warehouse
author: LaunchDarkly

formVariables.name: User
formVariables.description: The user used to connect to Snowflake for accessing experimentation data

formVariables.name: Role
formVariables.description: The role used by the connecting user

formVariables.name: Organization
formVariables.description: The name of the Snowflake organization being connected

formVariables.name: Warehouse
formVariables.description: The Snowflake warehouse containing experimentation data

formVariables.name: Database
formVariables.description: The Snowflake database containing experimentation data

formVariables.name: Schema
formVariables.description: The Snowflake schema containing experimentation data

formVariables.name: Region
formVariables.description: The Snowflake region the warehouse resides in

formVariables.name: Private Key
formVariables.description: Private key for the user connecting to Snowlake

formVariables.name: Public Key
formVariables.description: Public key for the user connecting to Snowflake
Select an environment from the list
formVariables.name: Environment selector
formVariables.description: The clientside ID of the LaunchDarkly environment to connect experimentation data to
